Lätt detta, såhär ser beskrivningen ut för mig:

1. Launch regedit.exe from "Start Menu/Run dialog" 
2. Locate the following key: 
"HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINEHARDWAREDEVICEMAPScsiScsi Port 2" 
The port number may vary, look for key with reference to 
"a347scsi" 
3. Right click on this key and choose "Permissions..." 
4. Select the "Administrators" group 
5. Check the "Deny" box on second permission row ("Read") 
6. Validate by "Ok" 
7. Answer "Yes" to the confirmation dialog 
8. Close the Registry Editor window and enjoy this nice game.

Excuse me again, I figured it out, but for everyone else:

Program(s) needed: WinRAR, PowerISO (That's what I used)

Step one: Right click "Pirates1.001" and choose open with... and pick WinRAR, wait while it unpacks

Step two: the same as step one, but with "Pirates2.001", wait.

Step three: Open "Pirates1.mds" in PowerISO and run "Autorun.exe" and start installing, then a error message comes up, just do the same thing with "Pirates2.mds", click autorun, then resume installing

Step four: et voila! one Sid Meiers PIRATES! installed! Enjoy

P.S. You'll need a NoCD/DVD crack for this one...

// Installarion
